One Level Up Top Level

ocaml/debugger/Makefile - ocaml

  1. #**************************************************************************
  2. #*                                                                        *
  3. #*                                 OCaml                                  *
  4. #*                                                                        *
  5. #*            Xavier Leroy, projet Cristal, INRIA Rocquencourt            *
  6. #*                                                                        *
  7. #*   Copyright 1999 Institut National de Recherche en Informatique et     *
  8. #*     en Automatique.                                                    *

  11. #*   the GNU Lesser General Public License version 2.1, with the          *
  12. #*   special exception on linking described in the file LICENSE.          *
  13. #*                                                                        *
  14. #**************************************************************************

  16. ROOTDIR = ..

  18. include $(ROOTDIR)/Makefile.common
  19. include $(ROOTDIR)/Makefile.best_binaries

  21. DYNLINKDIR=$(ROOTDIR)/otherlibs/dynlink
  22. UNIXDIR=$(ROOTDIR)/otherlibs/unix

  24. CAMLC=$(BEST_OCAMLC) $(STDLIBFLAGS)
  25. COMPFLAGS=$(INCLUDES) -absname -w +a-4-9-41-42-44-45-48-70 -warn-error +A \
  26.           -strict-sequence -strict-formats
  27. LINKFLAGS=-linkall -I $(UNIXDIR) -I $(DYNLINKDIR)
  28. OC_OCAMLDEPDIRS = $(DIRECTORIES)

  30. DIRECTORIES=$(UNIXDIR) $(DYNLINKDIR) $(addprefix $(ROOTDIR)/,\
  31.   utils parsing typing bytecomp toplevel driver file_formats lambda)

  33. INCLUDES=$(addprefix -I ,$(DIRECTORIES))

  35. compiler_modules := $(addprefix $(ROOTDIR)/toplevel/,\
  36.   genprintval topprinters)

  38. debugger_modules := \
  39.   int64ops primitives unix_tools debugger_config parameters debugger_lexer \
  40.   input_handling question debugcom exec source pos checkpoints events \
  41.   program_loading symbols breakpoints trap_barrier history printval \
  42.   show_source time_travel program_management frames eval \
  43.   show_information loadprinter debugger_parser command_line main

  45. compiler_objects := $(addsuffix .cmo,$(compiler_modules))

  47. debugger_objects := $(addsuffix .cmo,$(debugger_modules))

  49. libraries = $(ROOTDIR)/compilerlibs/ocamlcommon.cma \
  50.   $(UNIXDIR)/unix.cma $(DYNLINKDIR)/dynlink.cma

  52. all: ocamldebug$(EXE)

  54. ocamldebug.cmo: $(debugger_objects)
  55.         $(V_OCAMLC)$(CAMLC) -pack $(COMPFLAGS) -o $@ $^

  57. ocamldebug$(EXE): $(libraries) $(compiler_objects) ocamldebug.cmo \
  58.     ocamldebug_entry.cmo
  59.         $(V_LINKC)$(CAMLC) $(LINKFLAGS) -o $@ -linkall $^

  61. install:
  62.         $(INSTALL_PROG) ocamldebug$(EXE) "$(INSTALL_BINDIR)"

  64. .PHONY: clean
  65. clean::
  66.         rm -f ocamldebug ocamldebug.exe
  67.         rm -f *.cmo *.cmi

  69. .PHONY: distclean
  70. distclean: clean

  72. ocamldebug_entry.cmo: ocamldebug_entry.ml ocamldebug.cmo
  73.         $(V_OCAMLC)$(CAMLC) -c $(COMPFLAGS) $<

  75. %.cmo: %.ml
  76.         $(V_OCAMLC)$(CAMLC) -c $(COMPFLAGS) -for-pack ocamldebug $<

  78. %.cmi: %.mli
  79.         $(V_OCAMLC)$(CAMLC) -c $(COMPFLAGS) -for-pack ocamldebug $<

  81. depend: beforedepend
  82.         $(V_OCAMLDEP)$(OCAMLDEP_CMD) *.mli *.ml > .depend

  84. clean::
  85.         rm -f debugger_lexer.ml
  86. beforedepend:: debugger_lexer.ml

  88. clean::
  89.         rm -f $(addprefix debugger_parser.,ml mli output)
  90. beforedepend:: debugger_parser.ml debugger_parser.mli

  92. include .depend
